Sinopse: Starr Carter is constantly switching between two worlds: the poor, mostly black, neighborhood where she lives and the rich, mostly white, prep school she attends. Now, facing pressures from all sides of the community, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what's right.—Twentieth Century Fox
